mapper.select: select * from answerquestion where aq_text = #{text} and source_id = #{id}
mapper.insert: insert into answerquestion (aq_id, aq_text, aq_A, aq_B, aq_C, aq_D, aq_E, aq_F, aq_parse, aq_level, source_id) values (#{aqId}, #{aqText}, #{aqA}, #{aqB}, #{aqC}, #{aqD}, #{aqE}, #{aqF}, #{aqParse}, #{aqLevel}, #{sourceId})
